ModMetaData.name: Funny Creatures
ModMetaData.author: PredatorKing
ModMetaData.description:
My first Mod, literally adds some creatures I tried making to try and get better at modding. They're not broken or anything its just that you (player man/woman) might find the quality quite lacking lol. Anyways I plan to put in as much detail work as I can. The mod currently includes:
- Meffalo - Boomsloth
Please keep in mind I'm still working on this mod so... yeah. If you have any suggestions or see any bugs feel free to comment.
